definitions: a shark of tropical and temperate oceans that has flattened blade-like extensions on either side of the head, with the eyes and nostrils placed at or near the ends.

notes.text: Family Sphyrnidae and genus Sphyrna: several species

shortDefinitions: shark with flattened blade-like extensions on either side of head

definitions: a brown African marsh bird related to the storks, having a crest that looks like a backward projection of the head, and constructing an enormous nest.

notes.text: Scopus umbretta, the only member of the family Scopidae
